Top 10 Strategic Technology Trends for 2025: Agentic AI
abstract: The 2025 strategic technology trends report underscores the transformative impact of Agentic AI across CRM, cloud, and data ecosystems, positioning autonomous decision‑making as a catalyst for scalable innovation. Its insights drive measurable reductions in cloud migration expenditures by optimizing resource allocation and automating workload orchestration.

title: Critical Capabilities for Sales Force Automation 2024
Top 10 Strategic Technology Trends for 2025: Agentic AI
abstract: Gartner’s 2025 strategic technology trend analysis highlights Agentic AI as a catalyst for integrating cloud‑based CRM and data ecosystems to deliver hyper‑personalized customer experiences. This shift is projected to lift customer retention rates by up to 25 % through context‑aware, proactive engagement models.
